message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_FV_REFERENCE_EXISTS
message.locale: An expected outcome with the reference number specified already exists. Expected outcome reference number must be unique.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: An expected outcome with the name specified already exists. Expected outcome name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This outcome has already been cancelled.
This expected outcome has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_CANCELED
message.locale: This outcome has been cancelled and cannot be modified.
This expected outcome has been canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_GOAL
message.locale: This expected outcome is assigned to at least one goal and cannot be cancelled.
This expected outcome is assigned to at least one goal and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_PLANITEM
message.locale: This expected outcome is assigned to at least one plan item and cannot be cancelled.
This expected outcome is assigned to at least one plan item and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_SUBGOAL
message.locale: This expected outcome is assigned to at least one sub goal and cannot be cancelled.
This expected outcome is assigned to at least one sub goal and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_OUTCOME_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_REFERENCE
message.locale: This expected outcome is assigned to at least one %1c and cannot be deleted.
